snippet.title: Shattered - Tale of the Forgotten King Official Release Trailer
snippet.description:
SHATTERED – TALE OF THE FORGOTTEN KING IS OUT!

➡️ https://store.steampowered.com/app/1045180/Shattered__Tale_of_the_Forgotten_King/

Dive in a dark science-fantasy tale, fight your way through the ruins and recover your memory. Welcome to Hypnos, dear Wanderer…
----------
Don't want to miss anything? Join us on social media!

• https://twitter.com/RedlockStudio
• https://www.facebook.com/taleoftheforgottenking
• https://www.instagram.com/redlockstudio/
• https://discord.gg/k2CfrDh8KW

----------
Song: Dream Pursuit - Ocoeur
Video: leSha
